definitions.text: add details, as to an account or idea; clarify the meaning of and discourse in a learned way, usually in writing
examples: She elaborated on the main ideas in her dissertation

definitions.text: produce from basic elements or sources; change into a more developed product
make more complex, intricate, or richer
marked by complexity and richness of detail
developed or executed with care and in minute detail; ; - John Buchan
examples: the elaborate register of the inhabitants prevented tax evasion
